channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Southern California rain helps firefighters but creates risk of toxic ash runoff
item.description: Rain falling on Southern California is expected to aid firefighters mopping up multiple wildfires. But potentially heavy downpours on charred hillsides could bring new troubles such as toxic ash runoff.

item.title: More DEI fallout: Air Force scraps course that used videos of Tuskegee Airmen and female WWII pilots
FACT FOCUS: A look at false and misleading claims made by Trump during his first week back in office
